name: Aluna Games
tag_list: games, gaming, online, free2play, free-to-play, mmo, mmog, mmorpg, browsergames, browser-based-games, online-games
description: Free to Play Online Gaming Portal
overview: Aluna Games is a publisher and developer of online multiplayer games, and is based in the United Kingdom. The company specialises in free to play MMO and single player games, and features a growing portal of both browser-based and downloadable games. Aluna also allows players to socialise and play interactively, with its various social networking tools.

milestones.description: UK-based online games portal now live, with Sacred Seasons 2 to be its first MMORPG.
milestones.source_description: Aluna Games online games portal launches!
